home.intro: Developer tools, financial calculators, and productivity boosters. All the utilities you need in one place.

word_counter.title: Word Counter
word_counter.description: Count words and characters in your text.
word_counter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...
word_counter.seo_content: This is a free online word counter tool. It helps you count words and characters for your essays, articles, and social media posts.

json_formatter.title: JSON Formatter
json_formatter.description: Format, validate, and minify your JSON data.
json_formatter.seo_content: Free online JSON Formatter and Validator. Beautify your JSON code, validate syntax, and minify for production.

lotto_generator.title: Lotto Number Generator
lotto_generator.description: Generate 6 lucky lotto numbers for free.
lotto_generator.seo_content: Free online lottery number generator. Randomly draw 6 numbers from 1 to 45 to test your luck. Save and manage your generated numbers.

server_time.title: Server Time Check
server_time.description: Check the exact server time of any website.
server_time.subtitle: Essential for ticketing and course registration where every second counts.
server_time.tip1: Works on the same principle as Navyism.
server_time.tip2: Calculates time based on the server's Date header information.
server_time.tip3: Minor deviations may occur due to network latency.
server_time.tip4: Watch the time flow in real-time without refreshing.
server_time.seo_content: Free online server time checker tool. Check the exact server time of Ticketmaster, StubHub, or any website down to 0.1 seconds. Essential tool for successful ticket purchases and course registration.

stock_average_calculator.title: Stock Average Down Calculator
stock_average_calculator.description: Calculate your new average price by entering your current holdings and additional purchases.
stock_average_calculator.seo_content: Free stock average down calculator. Calculate how much you can lower your average price by buying more shares. Essential tool for successful stock and crypto investing.

ticketing_practice.title: Ticketing Practice Game
ticketing_practice.description: Improve your click speed and accuracy with realistic ticketing practice.
ticketing_practice.share_message: Ticketing Practice Score: {score}! Can you beat me? üëâ
ticketing_practice.seo_content: Free ticketing practice game for Ticketmaster, StubHub, etc. Improve your reaction speed and click accuracy to secure the tickets you want.

salary_calculator.title: Real Salary Calculator (US)
salary_calculator.description: Calculate your estimated monthly take-home pay after Federal, State, and FICA taxes.
salary_calculator.seo_content: US Salary Calculator 2025. Estimate your paycheck after Federal Tax, Social Security, Medicare, and State Taxes.

image_to_base64.title: Image to Base64 Converter
image_to_base64.description: Convert image files to Base64 strings. Useful for embedding images directly into HTML or CSS.
image_to_base64.upload_label: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select

base64_to_image.title: Base64 Image Decoder
base64_to_image.description: Convert Base64 strings back to image files. Preview and download the result.

compound_interest.title: Compound Interest Calculator
compound_interest.description: Calculate the future value of your investment with monthly contributions.
compound_interest.subtitle: See how your money grows over time with the power of compound interest.
compound_interest.seo_content: Free online compound interest calculator. Visualize your investment growth with monthly contributions. Essential tool for financial planning and retirement strategy.

uuid_generator.title: UUID Generator
uuid_generator.description: Generate and copy secure, unique UUID v4 strings in bulk.
uuid_generator.subtitle: Bulk UUID generation tool for developers
uuid_generator.seo_content: Free online UUID v4 generator. Generate multiple secure UUIDs at once for database keys or unique identifiers. Generated locally in your browser for security.

unit_converter.title: Unit Converter
unit_converter.description: Convert various units such as length, weight, volume, area, and temperature quickly and easily.
unit_converter.seo_content: Free online unit converter. Convert meters, inches, feet, kilograms, pounds, Celsius, Fahrenheit, and more for daily life and work.

jwt_decoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwt_decoder.description: Decode JWTs instantly in your browser. No server-side processing for your security.
jwt_decoder.privacy_alert: Your token is decoded locally in your browser and never sent to any server.
jwt_decoder.seo_content: Free online JWT Decoder. View the Header and Payload of your JSON Web Token (JWT) instantly. All processing is done client-side for your security.

unix_timestamp.title: Unix Timestamp Converter
unix_timestamp.description: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa.
unix_timestamp.seo_content: Free online Unix Timestamp Converter. Convert Epoch time to human-readable dates or dates to Unix timestamps. Check real-time current Unix time.

cron_generator.title: Cron Expression Generator
cron_generator.description: Generate complex Cron schedules easily with a few clicks.
cron_generator.seo_content: Free online Cron Expression Generator. Create Linux Crontab schedules easily with a GUI and get human-readable descriptions. Set up recurring tasks for minutes, hours, days, weeks, and months.

roi_calculator.title: ROI Calculator
roi_calculator.description: Calculate your Return on Investment (ROI) and annualized ROI.
roi_calculator.seo_content: Free online ROI Calculator. Calculate your Return on Investment percentage, Total Profit, and Annualized ROI (CAGR) instantly. Useful for analyzing stocks, real estate, and business investments.

youtube_calculator.title: YouTube Earnings Calculator
youtube_calculator.description: Estimate your daily, monthly, and yearly potential earnings on YouTube.
youtube_calculator.disclaimer: Estimates only. Actual earnings vary by niche and country.
youtube_calculator.seo_content: Free online YouTube Estimated Earnings Calculator. Estimate your potential daily, monthly, and yearly revenue based on daily views and RPM. Essential tool for YouTubers and creators.

pomodoro_timer.title: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoro_timer.description: Boost productivity with the Pomodoro Technique. 25 min focus, 5 min break.
pomodoro_timer.seo_content: Free online Pomodoro Timer. Boost your focus and productivity with the 25-minute work and 5-minute break cycle. Optimized for study, work, and coding.

password_generator.title: Password Generator
password_generator.seo_content: Free online strong password generator. Create secure, unhackable passwords with customizable length and character options. Works entirely client-side for safety.

qr_code.title: QR Code Generator
qr_code.description: Convert URLs, text, emails, and more into QR codes and download them.
qr_code.seo_content: Free online QR Code Generator. Convert website links, text, and contact info into QR codes and download as PNG images. Customize colors and size freely.

privacy.intro_content: Welcome to Cheetset. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
privacy.data_collection_content: We do not collect any personal data that can identify you directly. However, we may collect non-personal data such as browser type, operating system, and IP address for analytics purposes to improve our service.
privacy.cookies_content: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, or to alert you when websites set or access cookies.
privacy.adsense_content_1: We use Google AdSense to display ads. Google uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites. Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to you based on your visit to our sites and/or other sites on the Internet.
privacy.adsense_content_2: You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google Ads Settings.
privacy.security_content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way. For tools like our "Word Counter", all processing happens in your browser. Your text data is never sent to our servers.
privacy.contact_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at: support@cheetset.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro_content: Welcome to Cheetset. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions.
terms.usage_content: You must use our services for lawful purposes only. Our tools are provided 'as is' without any warranties.
terms.disclaimer_content: Cheetset does not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the service. In particular, results from financial tools (Salary Calculator, Compound Interest Calculator, etc.) should be used for reference only.
terms.contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@cheetset.com
